Kabuto slams his hand on the surface of water containing his [[Clone Snakes|specially-developed snakes]] and emits dark-red lightning, which causes the snakes to take on the form of a giant blue snake with a red mouth and no eyes. The snake then rams and pushes the enemy underwater in an attempt to drown them. Kabuto used this technique within [[The Hole]], which is known to speed up the recreation process of his snakes.
